definition: high bank, deep valley (idiom); secluded location

sentences.english: Life has its ups and downs, its peaks and its valleys.
sentences.chinese: 人生也有兴衰起伏，也有巅峰和深谷。

sentences.english: Along the ravine there was a mule path.
sentences.chinese: 沿着这条深谷有一条羊肠小路。

sentences.english: Abad's Angosta is fables in today's world.
sentences.chinese: 阿瓦德的《深谷幽城》是一部当今世界的寓言。

sentences.english: Mount Taishan aBounds in lofty peaks, deep valleys and rare cultural relics of the ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 泰山有许多高峰深谷和丰富的古代珍贵文物。

sentences.english: It was filled with the calls of wild birds and the crystal sound of running water in the ravine.
sentences.chinese: 在深谷里到处是野禽鸣叫声和清脆的潺潺流水声。

sentences.english: Its highest peak Yuhuangding stands over deep valleys and above other perilous peaks.
sentences.chinese: 它的最高峰在深谷毓璜顶站及以上的其他危险的山峰。

sentences.english: Let us not wallow in the valley of despair.
sentences.chinese: 我们切莫再沉湎于绝望的深谷之中。

sentences.english: And looking down, he found the valley immersed in thin fog, seeming bottomless.
sentences.chinese: 向下望去，只见深谷中云雾渳漫，兀自不见尽头。

sentences.english: Pointing down to the bottom of the cliff, Mary showed us the dangerous rocks.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽指向悬崖深谷，让我们看那些危险的石块。

sentences.english: These mini-beetles will be the same ones from the Named Hive Defender (see above) but they will not respawn.
sentences.chinese: 这些小甲虫同深谷卫兵一样，但他们不会刷新出现。

sentences.english: The mountain range has many high peaks and deep canyons. The scenery is very beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 这条山脉有很多高峰和深谷，风光美极的了。

sentences.english: Babi Yar is a ravine just outside Kiev which is the capital of Ukraine.
sentences.chinese: 斯皮尔伯格是一个深谷基辅郊外的是乌克兰首都。

sentences.english: Some little rockets for his mouth and eyes.
sentences.chinese: 一些小的身故体验深谷他的嘴巴和眼睛。

definition: halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
